sections.heading: of district; construction of act
sections.text: Nothing in the Nebraska Chemigation Act shall be construed to limit the powers of a district provided in the Nebraska Ground Water Management and Protection Act.SourceLaws 1986, LB 284, ยง 48.Cross ReferencesNebraska Ground Water Management and Protection Act, see sec

46-1148.Powers of district; construction of act.

Nothing in the Nebraska Chemigation Act shall be construed to limit the powers of a district provided in the Nebraska Ground Water Management and Protection Act.

SourceLaws 1986, LB 284, ยง 48.

Cross ReferencesNebraska Ground Water Management and Protection Act, see section 46-701.
